remarks: A semigroup operation is associative.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jan-2020.)
statement:
sgrpass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
sgrpass.o $e |- .o. = ( +g ` G ) $.
sgrpass $p |- ( ( G e. SGrp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .o. Y ) .o. Z ) = ( X .o. ( Y .o. Z ) ) ) $.
